Race.SpecificTitle: Chief of Police -- Town of Church Point
City of Crowley Prop.#1 -- 5 Mill-Street-Mayor&BOA-10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
City of Crowley Propositions

Proposition No. 1
(Renewal of Five (5) Mill Street Maintenance Tax)

Summary:  To authorize the City of Crowley to levy and collect a Five (5) Mill Tax ("Renewal") annually for a period of ten (10) years for the purpose of Street Maintenance.
Race.FullText: Shall the City of Crowley, State of Louisiana, (the "City") under the provisions of Article VI, Section 22, Section 27(B), Section 30(A) of the Constitution of the State of Louisiana of 1974, continue to levy and collect a Five (5) Mill Tax on all property subject to taxation situated within said City (current estimated annual amount of  $332,123.48), annually for a period of ten (10) years, commencing with the year 2011 and ending in the year 2020, for the purpose of constructing and maintaining streets, roads, highways and avenues in the said City?

Race.SpecificTitle: City of Crowley Prop.#2 -- 5 Mill-Build&Drain-Mayor&BOA-10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
City of Crowley Propositions

Proposition No. 2
(Renewal of Five (5) Mill Public Building & Drainage Maintenance Tax)

Summary:  To authorize the City of Crowley to levy and collect a Five (5) Mill Tax ("Renewal") annually for a period of ten (10) years for the purpose of Public Building and Drainage Maintenance.
Race.FullText: Shall the City of Crowley, State of Louisiana, (the "City") under the provisions of Article VI, Section 22, Section 27(B), Section 30(A) of the Constitution of the State of Louisiana of 1974, continue to levy and collect a Five (5) Mill Tax on all property subject to taxation situated within said City (current estimated annual amount of $332,123.48), annually for a period of ten (10) years, commencing with the year 2011 and ending in the year 2020, for the purpose of maintaining public buildings, constructing and maintaining bridges and maintaining public grounds, public parks and the drainage system of the said City?

Race.SpecificTitle: City of Crowley Prop.#3 -- 3/4 Mill-Mayor&BOA-10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
City of Crowley Propositions

Proposition No. 3
(Renewal of Three Fourths (3/4) Mill Cemetery Maintenance Tax)

Summary:  To authorize the City of Crowley to levy and collect a Three-Fourths (3/4) Mill Tax ("Renewal") annually for a period of ten (10) years for the purpose of Maintaining Cemeteries.
Race.FullText: Shall the City of Crowley, State of Louisiana, (the "City") under the provisions of Article VI, Section 22, Section 27(B), Section 30(A) of the Constitution of the State of Louisiana of 1974, continue to levy and collect a Three-Fourths (3/4) Mill Tax on all property subject to taxation situated within said City (current estimated annual amount of $49,835.55), annually for a period of ten (10) years, commencing with the year 2011 and ending in the year 2020, for the purpose of maintaining cemeteries, title of which is in the name of said City?

Race.SpecificTitle: Fourth Ward Drain. Dist. No. 1 -- 6.32 Mills - BOC - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Fourth Ward Drainage District No. 1 Proposition
(Tax Renewal)

Summary:  A ten (10) year ad valorem tax of six & thirty-two-one-hundredths (6.32) mills on property subject to taxation situated in the District for the purpose of acquiring, constructing, maintaining and operating gravity drainage works within and for the said District.
Race.FullText: Shall the Fourth Ward Drainage District No. 1 of the Parish of Acadia, State of Louisiana, (the "District"), continue to levy and collect a tax of six & thirty-two-one-hundredths (6.32) mills on all property subject to taxation situated in said District, (current estimated annual amount of $58,778.08), annually for a period of ten (10) years beginning with the year 2011 and ending with the year 2020 for the purpose of acquiring, constructing, maintaining and operating gravity drainage works within and for the said District?

Race.SpecificTitle: Egan Drainage District No. 1 -- 7 Mills - BOC - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Egan Drainage District No. 1 Proposition
(Tax Renewal)

Summary:  A ten (10) year ad valorem tax of seven (7) mills on property subject to taxation situated in the District for the purpose of acquiring, constructing, maintaining and operating gravity drainage works within and for the said District.
Race.FullText: Shall the Egan Drainage District No. 1 of the Parish of Acadia, State of Louisiana, (the "District"), continue to levy and collect a tax of Seven (7) mills on all property subject to taxation situated in said District, (current estimated annual amount of $49,025.27), annually for a period of ten (10) years beginning with the year 2011 and ending with the year 2020 for the purpose of acquiring, constructing, maintaining and operating gravity drainage works within and for the said District?
